body_content.explanation: having a lot of parts or made in an extremely complicated way:
examples: The film uses ultra-sophisticated special effects.
a new range of ultrasophisticated cameras

body_content.explanation: having an extremely good understanding of the way people behave or a very good knowledge of culture and fashion, or liked by people who are like this:
examples: My ultra-sophisticated friends all rushed out to buy the latest new gadget.
The coffee-making machine comes in an ultra-sophisticated black case.
